m_szDocSumamry: Up to: Main Sustainability Page Ideology and Sustainability I get some very quick reactions to my main page on the sustainability of material progress .   Quick reactions, whether favorable or unfavorable, cannot be based on reading the 50 or so pages.  They are reactions to my attitude, which is apparent in the first paragraph. For many, prophesying doom if we don't change our ways, is a signal of virtue.  Others are irritated by doom-saying and have an immediate favorable reaction.  There are at least some who are worried by the problems that have been proposed as obstacles to sustainability
